## RuleId[id=PointlessArithmeticExpression]
### PointlessArithmeticExpression

in `org.aspectj.ajdt.core/src/main/java/org/aspectj/org/eclipse/jdt/core/dom/AdviceDeclaration.java`
#### Snippet
```java
	 */

		return super.memSize() + 0; // ajh02: stub. I don't know what this is meant to do
	}

```

					&& Type.getSignature(c).equals(method.getSignature())) {
				return method;
